name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Red Lamborghini with Cityscape: Dynamic Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Red Lamborghini with Cityscape:A vibrant live wallpaper featuring a clock and Google search bar, blending elegance and urban energy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Watch a red Lamborghini race through a lively city with stunning visuals.
Minimalist Design: A user-friendly interface for smooth navigation.
Clock and Date: Elegant time and date display to stay organized.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Access your favorite sites with ease.
Search Bar: Effortless browsing with the built-in search tool.
More Extension: Unlock additional features for a customized experience.
It searches using the search engine selected by the user.
